overview: Those of a certain – shall we say, mature? – age might be forgiven somewhat for anticipating a lovelorn tale of repressed emotions, but believe us when we tell you that there’s nothing romantic about this bunch of sexed-up beauties. In fact, all they’re interested in is the next hard fuck. Fortunately, they’re surrounded by a gang of horny fuckers (Yuri Adamov, Shane Barret, gorgeous STAXUS exclusive, Victor Diamond et al) with exactly the same mind-set. The result? A breathtaking, cum-draining explosion that’ll leave you totally drained!
title: Brief Encounters
